About this Calendar

The city of Tampa website has a great calendar of upcoming events.Some are official city events, some are community events. I've wanted a way to see it in my calendar and whipped this up.

This calendar is automatically updated daily from the City of Tampa events listing.

Data source: City of Tampa Events json feed

Souce code: GitHub Repo
